column4: hi guys i just install the skype and now when i test my webcam on skype its shut it ,what should i do to fix it?
hi guys i just install the skype and now when i test my webcam on skype its shut it ,what should i do to fix it?
hi guys i just install the skype and now when i test my webcam on skype its shut it ,what should i do to fix it?
did you install Skype from the repositories or from their website?
their website i can be online but still when i test my video it shut it
run it from a terminal, in debug mode if that is available.
how can i do that?
open a terminal and type Skype, then give me the output when it crashes.
its just open skype as usual but not the problem is that my problem is when i test my webcam inside the skype it gives shut it my skype
I know that's the problem, but you should see an error message in the terminal when your application crashes.
nothing seen on screnn or on terminal
try skype --debug
interesting i did it and open skype as usual and then give my pass and then online and then test it again and it shut it again but in terminal its says "aborted"
I'll look if this a known problen.
looks like Skype is closed-source, no way to figure out what's wrong. Do you have PulseAudio installed?
how can i check?
https://help.ubuntu.com/community/Skype, try this guide.
ok let me read
wait, are you on Kubuntu or Ubuntu?
on Kubuntu 9.10, Skype should work with ALSA without configuration. What webcam are you using?
philips to ucam fun2

https://wiki.ubuntu.com/SkypeWebCams. Some Philips cams work on Skype, some do not. Yours might be one of those that doesn't. Try your webcam in any other program, and/or try and older version of Skype.
ok i will do
